sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"scrollcontroller"}}>{`ScrollController`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ScrollController`}</MDXTag>{` is specially written to control Framer's Scroll component.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Option`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`DefaultValue`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`throttle`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`150`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - How often to update the controller's state.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`scrollX`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The controller's current scroll position on the x axis.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`scrollY`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`number`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The controller's current scroll position on the y axis.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`scrollPoint`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`{x: number, y: number}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`A normalized value, 0 when the current page is the pager's first page and 1 when the current page is the pager's last page.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`direction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`{x: string, y: string}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`A point with either `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"left"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"right"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"none"`}</MDXTag>{` for `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`x`}</MDXTag>{`, and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"up"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"down"`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"none"`}</MDXTag>{` for `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`y`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`progress`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`{x: number, y: number}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Normalized values for each scroll axis. For `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`progress.x`}</MDXTag>{`, a value of 0 is full left and 1 is full right; for `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`progress.y`}</MDXTag>{`, a value of 0 is full top and 1 is full bottom.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`markers`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Marker[]`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`A stateful object containing data about each tracked marker Frame.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`content`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`React.Element`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The connected Scroll component's content frame.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`contentOffset`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`object`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`contentOffsetX`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`contentOffsetY`}</MDXTag>{` values, for controlling a Scroll component's scroll position.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Method`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`handleScroll(point: {x: number, y: number})`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Update the scroll controller using a point. Often, this is connected to a Scroll component's `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`onMove`}</MDXTag>{` callback.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`scrollToPoint(point: {x: number, y: number}, options)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Change the page `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`left`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`right`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`scrollToMarker(id: string, edges: string or string[], offset: number, options)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Scroll to a given marker, edge, with an offset and animation options.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`getMarker(props)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Get the current marker entry from a given set of Override props.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"markers"}}>{`Markers`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The ScrollController will keep track of certain Frames, referred to here as "markers". Markers are recognized automatically. A marker must be a child of the controller's connected scroll component's content, and may be a `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`design component`}</MDXTag>{` with an override prop named "markerId" (most often, this will be a hidden or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`opacity`}</MDXTag>{` zero text layer, ticked to be overridable) or may be a `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`code component`}</MDXTag>{` with a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`markerId`}</MDXTag>{` prop.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`For each markers, an entry is made in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`controller.markers`}</MDXTag>{`. In the case of `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`design component`}</MDXTag>{` markers, the marker's property name will be the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`props.id`}</MDXTag>{` of the design component instance, automatically generated by Framer X. If a marker is `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`code component`}</MDXTag>{`, its property name will be the value of its `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`props.markerId`}</MDXTag>{`. For example, a design component's entry may be found at `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`controller.markers.id_kukhbjalsdc`}</MDXTag>{`, whereas a code component's entry may be found at `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`controller.markers.myMarker`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Each marker's entry has the following stateful properties.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`absolute`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The marker's absolute position within the content Frame.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`offset`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The marker's position relative to the Scroll component's frame.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`progress`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The marker's progress through the Scroll component's frame. A marker's progress will be `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`{x: 0, y: 0}`}</MDXTag>{` when it is below and to the right of the frame and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`{x: 1, y: 1}`}</MDXTag>{` when it is above and to the left of the frame.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`intersect`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`A point with normalized `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`x`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`y`}</MDXTag>{` properties describing how much of the marker is currently in view.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`clip`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`A point describing which edges of the marker are clipped, or out of the Scroll component's current window. For `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`x`}</MDXTag>{`, a marker's clip state may be `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"none"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both-left"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both-right"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"left"`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"right"`}</MDXTag>{`. For `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`y`}</MDXTag>{`, a marker's clip state may be `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"none"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both-top"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"both-bottom"`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"top"`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`"bottom"`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`visible`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Whether the marker is at all visible in the Scroll component's current window.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Example:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-tsx"}}>{`import { Override } from "framer"
import { ScrollController } from "framer-controller"

const controller = new ScrollController()

// Apply this one to a scroll component
export const Scroll: Override = props => {
    controller.connect(props)
    return {
        ...controller.contentOffset,
        ...controller.state,
    }
}

export const ScrollToButton: Override = () => ({
    onClick() {
        controller.scrollToPosition({ x: 150, y: 500 })
    },
})

export const ScrollToMarkerButton: Override = props => ({
    onClick() {
        controller.scrollToMarker("id_GgNM8lDZQ", ["top", "left"], 32)
    },
})

// May be applied to many different markers, and will produce a unique marker for each.
export const ScrollMarker: Override = props => {
    const marker = controller.getMarker(props)
    if (!marker) return
    return {
        opacity: marker.intersect.y,
        left: 100 - marker.intersect.x * 100,
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
